data.actual_result: Some of the servers you previously visited will have their custom emojis disapear from your emoji picker, and you cannot use them, even when typed out, until app is restarted
data.expected_result: Custom emojis for all servers should always be available
data.short_description: Leaving a server causes the emojis of other servers you visited previously to disappear
data.steps_to_repro: - Be part of 4 servers (let's say A, B, C, D) with custom emojis added. You can test with much more than 4 servers, it may increase your success rate - Boot up the app - Switch to server A - Open your emoji picker to ensure emojis from server A are correctly loaded - Do the same for servers B and C  - Now switch to server D - Leave the server D - Return to servers A, B and C and check the emoji picker for each of them - If you cannot reproduce, try again after clearing your app data or uninstall/reinstall Discord and login back. The cache may cause inconsistencies.
